page.title: 17Richmond Schools
page.content: Richmond has two secondary schools Richmond Comprehemsive School of about 1500 pupils of ages 11 to 18.Some children board because their parents live abroad.St Francis Xavier Roman Catholic Comprehemsive School of about 250 pupils of ages 11 to 16 (sixth form pupils transfer to Richmond School). Richmond also has three Primary Schools : Richmond C.of E.Primary School (Voluntary Controlled)with about 320 children of ages 5 to 11.Richmond Methodist Primary School(Voluntary Controlled)with about 280 children of ages 5 to 11 St.Mary's Romen Catholic Primary School(Voluntary Aided)with about 180 children of ages 5 to 11. There is also the Convent of the Order of the Assumption.
